MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L6 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Parton Street, Onslow Road and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:27PM . Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:10PM on 29th January 2021.
